extension.name: Weather bootstrapped
extension.author: Helen
extension.description:
bootstrapped version of the weather module

The code number for the weather condition will be added after the path and before the file extension.

To get your WOEID visit Yahoo Weather and search for your location

The number in the url eg. weather.yahoo.com/united-kingdom/england/harrogate-22514/ is your WOEID

If you would like to use your own pictures you will need to rename them to correspond to the weather code eg. 30.png - see developer.yahoo.com/weather for a full list of condition codes and set the path and extension to them under Weather Images

For smaller forecast pictures you can use http://l.yimg.com/a/i/us/nws/weather/gr/ for the forecast images with an extension of s.png

To change the styling please edit weather css: the classes you can use are in the file

You can add any number of these modules to the page - just make sure you set a unique id for each one

field.name: woeid
field.label: WOEID
field.description: location WOEID, separate multiple WOEIDs with commas, no spaces, if you want a carousel

field.name: linktitle
field.label: Link title
field.description: title text for full forecast link

field.name: forecast
field.label: 5 day forecast
field.description: show 5 day forecast - if you have entered only one WOEID

field.name: start_collapsed
field.label: Start collapsed
field.description: show/hide 5 day forecast on page load with bootstrap templates

field.name: unique_id
field.label: unique id
field.description: if you would like multiple weather modules on a page each must have a unique id

field.name: owncache
field.label: cache
field.description: cache module output - does not need Joomla cache enabled

field.name: modstyle
field.label: module style
field.description: use non-bootstrap style if your site does not use bootstrap - it will add in the bootstrap.min.js and carousel.css You must have jQuery loaded. Also disables the mootools slide.

field.name: imgpath_big
field.label: Main images
field.description: The path to the image shown for todays weather

field.name: imgpath_small
field.label: Forecast images
field.description: The path to the images shown for the forecast
